Miami_Beach.Miami Book Fair International:
The Miami Book Fair is an annual literary festival event realized in Miami by Miami Dade College.
The fair, which has become a model for other fairs across the country, brings over 300 renowned national and international authors exhibitors to a weeklong celebration of all things literary and includes pavilions for translation, comics, children, and young adults. The mission of Miami Book Fair International is to promote reading, encourage writing, and heighten an awareness of literacy and the literary arts in the city's multi-ethnic community.
